Title: Relates to suspension of a license for failure to pay a fine for impaired driving violations
Summary: Permits the suspension of a license or driving privilege for failure to answer a summons for operating a motor vehicle while under the influence of alcohol or drugs; prohibits the reduction or waiving of fines or mandatory surcharges imposed for a violation of operating a motor vehicle while under the influence of alcohol or drugs.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to suspension of a license for failure to pay a fine for impaired driving violations
